content: **finished size** approx unstretched width 6 / 15 cm and length 5 / 14 cm from the pattern description *these wrist warmers are knit in the round using lace stitches adapted from pitsilised koekirjad by lelli reiman * purl stitches between the ribbons of lace ensure a snug fit and they knit up quickly in fingering weight yarns this design originally appeared on page 17 the nordic heritage museum s nordic knits booklet
